Tags:credits 
Roadkill was built using the wealth of open source plugins, parsers and generally useful code that exists out there. These include:

* [[http://www.jquery.com|jQuery]]
* [[http://htmldiff.codeplex.com|HTML diff]]
* [[http://creoleparser.codeplex.com|Creole Wiki Parser ]]
* [[http://www.fatcow.com/free-icons|Fatcow icon library]]
* [[http://www.nhforge.net|NHibernate]]
* [[http://dotnetzip.codeplex.com/|DotNetZip Library]]
* [[http://timeago.yarp.com/|jQuery timeago plugin]]
* [[http://github.com/aehlke/tag-it/|tagIt for jQuery]]
* [[http://www.ericmmartin.com/projects/simplemodal/|jQuery Simple Modal]]
* [[http://code.google.com/p/markdownsharp/|Markdown sharp]]
